attributes.description:
MOTUS NISSAN & RENAULT MENLYN offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

MOTUS MENLYN, where customers become friends

attributes.description:
2021 VW Tiguan 1.4 TSI DSG R Line, with balance of maintenance plan till 27/09/2026 or 90 000km, 

Extras: IQ Drive: adaptive Cruise Control, IQ Lights: Matrix Led, Multifunction Display, Multi-functional Sensor, Radio Composition Media, Remote Central Locking, tilting and Sliding Panoramic
Air-conditioner – Climate control, Alloy Wheels, Anti-lock Brake System, Bluetooth Connectivity, Cruise Control with Speed Limiter, Easy Open + Close Package with Electric Mirrors, Electric Windows Front and Rear, Electronic Immobilizer, IQ Drive: adaptive Cruise Control, IQ Lights: Matrix Led, Multifunction Display and many more. 



We at Anglo Auto offer financing on all our vehicles with all major institutions such as, Wesbank, MFC, ABSA, Standard Bank and Capitec. We do assist with deliveries nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. Listed price excludes all fees/costs.
